articles.description: In reality, if the F-35 had been the centerpiece of Top Gun, it would have made for an entirely different and possibly boring movie.
articles.content: Why didn’t the F-35 take the lead fighter role in Top Gun: Maverick? Tom Cruises new movie, Top Gun: Maverick, is a really fun movie. Like its predecessor, it gives the viewer a good feeling for what… [+7053 chars]
